org.wlf.filedownloader.db

接口 DatabaseCallback

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ContentDbDao
    所有已知实现类:
    BaseContentDbDao, DownloadFileDao

    public interface DatabaseCallback
    database callback, see SQLiteOpenHelper.onXXXX
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)
